channel.title: pricing on Antal Dániel, CFA
channel.description: Recent content in pricing on Antal Dániel, CFA

item.title: CEE Mini Recording Industry Workshop
item.description: A Baltikumtól a Balkánig tartó zenei piacképemet prezentáltam kiváló kollégáknak a State51 budapesti workshopján, amelyen a WIN és az IFPI vezetői is részt vettek. Élénk vita alakult ki a résztvevőkkel arról, hogy a feltörekvő piacok miért olyan lassan törekszenek a fejlett piacok után a digitális zenei életben.

item.title: CEEMPC session: Licensing, How To Tackle The Value Gap And A Discussion On Licensing Initiatives
Pricing
item.description: Optimize pricing or review regulated prices

item.title: Value added by music in public performance and home copying: economic theory and empirical applications for tariff setting
item.description: My short presentation highlighted the fact that the CEE region’s is much richer in terms of household cultural and recreational spending than music publishers believe.

item.title: Market size of the re-usable public sector information in Hungary
item.description: A localization of the measuring European Public Sector Information resources for Hungary in the fields of Business information, geographic information, legal information, meteorological information, social data and transport information. Market sizing, service levels, pricing.
